question.text: Conference participants interested in industrial development should ___ schedule a visit to Bridgevilleâ€™s factories.
The meteorological agency recommended that tourists to the region be ___ dressed for frigid conditions.

answer.explanation: We are giving more information on the adjective "dressed" so we use an adverb.

question.text: Aliflora, Inc,, grows fifty varieties of roses ___ and is now the second largest exporter in the region.

answer.explanation: We are giving more information on the verb "grows" so we use an adverb.

question.text: All members of the sales team are grateful for Michael Drey man's substantial ___ to the project over the last six months.

answer.explanation:
Contribution to st = Giving help/money to st
Substantial = Great

question.text: Yokohama-based Shinohara Industries ___ has a satellite office in Bangkok.

answer.explanation:
"And" requires at least two items/actions.
"Plus" goes with a comma.
Else only goes with nouns.
Therefore, we choose "also".

question.text: The gift shop in the hotel lobby specializes in handcrafted gift items, each one of them unique and ___..

answer.explanation: "Unique" is an adjective so the answer is also an adjective.

question.text: Manager Tony Lopez is in charge of unloading the merchandise ___ the supply trucks  arrive at the supermarket.

answer.explanation: "When" is the only answer that can connect two clauses.

question.text: Researchers at Gasnite Company have developed an improved method of ___ fuel from industrial waste materials.

answer.explanation:
Method of doing st = Way to do st
Extract = Remove

question.text: Please___ the bottom portion for your records.

answer.explanation:
This is an instruction so we use the verb in its original form.
Retain = Keep

question.text: Training for our new processors will take place ___ a three-day period in July.
